name: Just a Demo / Love and Memes
name_original: Just a Demo / Love and Memes
description:
Quick Note: This is _not_ so called "troll game". I can assure you, it has an actual story, proper dialogues and a conclusive ending. I put my heart and soul into it, and if by any chance you feel d i s g u s t e d by my atrocious art style, feel free to release your stress in the comments.

Just a Demo is your typical family friendly RPG Maker horror parody game. You can enjoy it with your whole family!

Some might say that the meme extinction may be the greatest l o s s that humanity have ever had, but here in the future no one cares about it whatsoever. However, there are two men of culture who still believe in the ephemeral meme existence. They call themselves "Meme Busters".

Many years of research of the meme history have given them enough hints to pinpoint the exact location of the latest epitome of dead memes. Together with the crew and with a slight hope of reviving their MewMewTube channel they go there in order to find the horrible truth. Will they be able to find the evidence of paranormal acmemeties or will all their efforts go to waste?

Some of the main features are:

–R E V O L U T I O N A R Y lack of gameplay

–U N P R E C E D E N T E D walking simulator

–C O M P L E T E L Y skippable story and dialogues

–R E L A T A B L E characters

–T H E C L A S S I E S T humor only

–F R E A K I N G doors

I'm not sure if I should mention the controls for this game, you only need one button to play it, really.

P.S. This demo was made by using only the latest p r o a d v a n c e d technologies from the future. That includes such innovative tools as MS Pain and RPGBaker. You won't find these things at any corner, you know.
(I mean, we're all here for the s t o r y, right?)

And yeah, I have a small favor of you. If anyone would kindly make a trailer (i.e. cut all the unnecessary parts) out of it, please feel free to send me a link.

And by no means don't consider supporting me, because we all know I don't deserve it.
